content: Great article Nick! You definitely lighten up my mind by this post since it helped me understand clearly and logically about “seems-to-be-obvious” things but I couldn’t explain before. BTW, when presenting about branding guidelines, the UI/UX designers told me that the whitespace we use (for example, in our company website) will make our brand look more professional and trustworthy. Why is that, and is there any psychological research or user behavior analysis to prove that?
